      • binding

        public ProxyBuilder binding(boolean binding)
        Whether to use binding or not.

        Binding is enabled by default. Set this to false to use old behavior without binding.

        If binding is enabled then Camel will bind the method parameters to the input Message on the Exchange when invoking the proxy.

        Parameters:
        binding - true to use binding, false to use the old behavior with using a BeanInvocation as a provisional message body
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        public <T> T build(Class<T> interfaceClass)
        throws Exception
        Builds the proxy.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - the service interface
        Returns:
        the proxied bean
        Throws:
        Exception - is thrown if error creating the proxy

      • build

        Builds the proxy.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the proxied bean
        Throws:
        Exception - is thrown if error creating the proxy
